) was synthesized by solid-state reaction method.
(99.99%) was purchased from Tailorlux (Münster, Germany), and
(99%) was purchased fromReachemSlovakia, (Bratislava, Slovakia). These reagents were
weighed and mixed in stoichiometric amounts (accurate weight of reagents are given in Table S1).
The powders were homogenized in an agate mortar with small amount of acetone as a grinding media.
The mixture of reagents was poured to the porcelain crucible and sintered at 600
C for 12 h in air three
times with intermediate grinding of the product.
